title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating Business Value with Cloud and AI (BIZ324)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过云和人工智能加速业务价值 (BIZ324)
abstract: Unlock the full potential of your Enterprise AI initiatives. Listen to enterprises as they reveal how the right cloud strategy is integral to accelerating AI innovation and value realization, driving more impactful business outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by Infosys, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 释放您企业 AI 计划的全部潜力。聆听企业分享正确的云策略如何成为加速 AI 创新和价值实现的关键，推动更具影响力的业务成果。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Infosys 为您呈现。

presenter.name: Mythili Madhira
presenter.title: SVP of Engineering at LPL Financial

presenter.name: Sri Kadasinghanahalli
presenter.title: Head of Data Platforms and Ops

presenter.name: Jen Scott
presenter.title: Manging Director, Head of C&I Digital technology
